<<<<<<< HEAD
Aron-bimnucha, or, An antidote to cure the Calamites of their trembling for fear of the Ark to which is added Mr. Crofton's creed touching church-communion : with a brief answer to the position (pretended to be) taken out of his pocket and added to the end of a scandalous and schismatical pamphlet, entituled Jerubbaal justified. Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.
[8], 116 p.
Printed for Richard Royston ..., London : 1663.
Running title: Israel's gratulation for the Arkes solemn settlement. "Mr. Crofton's position examined and an imposed liturgy justified": p. 106-116. Errata: prelim. p. [8] Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Includes bibliographical references.
=======
Aron-bimnucha, or, An antidote to cure the Calamites of their trembling for fear of the Ark to which is added Mr. Crofton's creed touching church-communion : with a brief answer to the position (pretended to be) taken out of his pocket and added to the end of a scandalous and schismatical pamphlet, entituled Jerubbaal justified. Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.
[8], 116 p.
Printed for Richard Royston ..., London : 1663.
Running title: Israel's gratulation for the Arkes solemn settlement. "Mr. Crofton's position examined and an imposed liturgy justified": p. 106-116. Errata: prelim. p. [8] Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Includes bibliographical references.
Richard Royston
